typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(movie),
	each(match(name != 'movie'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DistinctRows
source1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	)) ~> Select1
DistinctRows aggregate(rowcount = count(1)) ~> RowCount
Select1 aggregate(rowcount2 = count(1)) ~> RowCount2
